com.yantra.ycp.passwordpolicy.dom

Interface IPasswordPolicyForSecretAnswers

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IPasswordPolicy

    public interface IPasswordPolicyForSecretAnswers
extends IPasswordPolicy
    This interface provides methods to be used when answer to authentication questions is attempted.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.w3c.dom.Document onAnswerAttempt(YFSEnvironment env, org.w3c.dom.Document user, org.w3c.dom.Document answerDoc)
      This method is invoked when answer is attempted.
      org.w3c.dom.Document onAnswerFailure(YFSEnvironment env, org.w3c.dom.Document user, org.w3c.dom.Document answerDoc)
      This method is invoked when an incorrect answer is provided.
      org.w3c.dom.Document onAnswerSuccess(YFSEnvironment env, org.w3c.dom.Document user, org.w3c.dom.Document answerDoc)
      This method is invoked when a correct answer is provided.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.yantra.ycp.passwordpolicy.dom.IPasswordPolicy

        setParams

    • Method Detail

      • onAnswerAttempt

        org.w3c.dom.Document onAnswerAttempt(YFSEnvironment env,
                                     org.w3c.dom.Document user,
                                     org.w3c.dom.Document answerDoc)
        This method is invoked when answer is attempted. env Environment handle user Document based user attributes answerDoc Answer provided for the authentication questions Document specifying the result of the method. The document should necessarily be in format <PasswordPolicyResult Result="SUCCESS|FAILURE|REQUIRE_PASSWORD_CHANGE" DaysUntilExpiration="(number)" ErrorCode="(used if failure)"/>

      • onAnswerFailure

        org.w3c.dom.Document onAnswerFailure(YFSEnvironment env,
                                     org.w3c.dom.Document user,
                                     org.w3c.dom.Document answerDoc)
        This method is invoked when an incorrect answer is provided. env Environment handle user Document based user attributes answerDoc Answer provided for the authentication questions Document specifying the result of the method. The document should necessarily be in format <PasswordPolicyResult Result="SUCCESS|FAILURE|REQUIRE_PASSWORD_CHANGE" DaysUntilExpiration="(number)" ErrorCode="(used if failure)"/>

      • onAnswerSuccess

        org.w3c.dom.Document onAnswerSuccess(YFSEnvironment env,
                                     org.w3c.dom.Document user,
                                     org.w3c.dom.Document answerDoc)
        This method is invoked when a correct answer is provided. env Environment handle user Document based user attributes answerDoc Answer provided for the authentication questions Document specifying the result of the method. The document should necessarily be in format <PasswordPolicyResult Result="SUCCESS|FAILURE|REQUIRE_PASSWORD_CHANGE" DaysUntilExpiration="(number)" ErrorCode="(used if failure)"/>
